actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing testimony by Roy C. Meyers and Herman Schwartz, and representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the cases of William P. Tavoulareas, et al. v. The Washington Post Co., et al. and William P. Tavoulareas, et al. v. Philip Piro, Civil Action Nos.80-3032, 80-2387.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent a Senate employee and a former Senate employee in the cases of William P. Tavoulareas, et al. v. The Washington Post Co., et al. and William P. Tavoulareas, et al. v. Philip Piro. Authorizes the employees to testify in the cases, except concerning matters determined privileged from disclosure.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing testimony by Roy C. Meyers and Herman Schwartz, and representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the cases of William P. Tavoulareas, et al. v. The Washington Post Co., et al. and William P. Tavoulareas, et al. v. Philip Piro, Civil Action Nos.80-3032, 80-2387.
